summary: Pokémon is a popular Japanese franchise with video games, TV shows, movies, and trading cards. It's about people and creatures called Pokémon living together. The games, created by Game Freak, started it all and became super famous worldwide, especially in 1998-2000. Pokémon is now owned by three companies: Nintendo, Game Freak, and Creatures, with each having different roles. The franchise has made a lot of money and is still very popular today, with new games and products released regularly.
title: Pokémon
